title: Bug 109718: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR THE USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put the mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips show in the given format
Actual Result: Tips show in one line
OB: When putting large content in the text item and hovering the mouse over it, the tips that should be displayed are shown in a single line.
EB: The tips should be displayed in the given format regardless of the content's length.
SR:
1. Open the software
2. Put a large content in a text item
3. Hover the mouse over the text item
4. Observe that the tips are displayed in a single line instead of the expected format
